name: aCoobe
tagline: Process optimization for your successful business
description:
aCoobe is an IT and Innovation Company which develops and implements custom software systems in Lithuania, Europe and the U.S. We develop business management, e-commerce systems, websites and smartphone applications.
We offer full custom software development services and nearshore and offshore outsourcing. 
Specialties: WEB applications, smartphone applications, solutions for e-business 
Using: Python + Django, PHP, Android and iOS
